entries.desc: builds SRS telemetry aggregates for dashboards.
merges and summarizes telemetry inputs.
file-backed registry scanning `docs/srs/*.md`, normalizes IDs, parses Version, detects duplicates/missing IDs.
contract for SRS document metadata (ID, Version, Path).
registry contract for lookup and enumeration.
loads `docs/module-srs-map.yaml` and resolves requirement IDs for module path prefixes.
record implementation of ISrsDocument.
normalizes requirement IDs (hyphen variants, case).
validates IDs and detects normalized ID collisions.
model for telemetry event lines.
model for telemetry summary output.
builds telemetry summaries from JSONL event streams.
CLI parsing and help text.
emits JSONL logs for each invocation.
CLI entry point coordinating parsing, logging, and simulation.
compares two JSONL logs and prints timing deltas (text/JSON).
replays recorded JSONL logs to stdout/stderr with timing.
guards against network assemblies and Process.Start invocations.
loads failure simulation configuration from environment and JSON.
telemetry subcommands (summarize, write, check, validate).
centralized helpers for reading environment variables.
